    • Method Detail

      • setListeners

        private void setListeners(java.lang.String text)
        Add the undo manager to the edit listener list and add a focus change listener to the text area
        Parameters:
        text - text to display in the text area

      • updateText

        protected void updateText(boolean undoable)
        Flag the text as being allowed/prevented being stored as an update on the undo/redo stack. The other criteria (the allow undo flag is set and the text has changed) must be met in order for the edit to be undoable
        Parameters:
        undoable - true to enable putting the edit on the undo/redo stack

      • setText

        private void setText()
        Check if an edit to the text area should be stored on the undo/redo stack, and if so add it to the stack
